ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tuslem.k | |- K = ( toUnifSp ` U ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_tuslem | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> ( X = ( Base ` K ) /\ U = ( UnifSet ` K ) /\ ( unifTop ` U ) = ( TopOpen ` K ) ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_simp1d | |- ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) -> X = ( Base ` K ) ) |
